    • EXTENSIONS_TRACE_OPTION

      static final String EXTENSIONS_TRACE_OPTION
      The option argument extensions must use when using MCP's DebugTrace
      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

  • Method Details

    • addResource

      void addResource(io.modelcontextprotocol.server.McpServerFeatures.SyncResourceSpecification resource)
      Adds a resource to the server. Can be used to dynamically make resources available based on state of IDE. For example, to dynamically have a resource for each open editor available
      Parameters:
      uri -
      name -
      description -
      mimeType -

    • removeResource

      void removeResource(String uri)
      Removes a previously added resource from the server
      Parameters:
      uri -

    • getToolVisibility

      boolean getToolVisibility(String toolName)
      Parameters:
      toolName -
      Returns:
      true if toolName is currently available on server

    • setToolVisibility

      boolean setToolVisibility(String toolName, boolean isVisible)
      Adds / Removes a tool from the server Can be used to remove declared tools from the server based on user preferences
      Parameters:
      toolName -
      isVisible -
      Returns:
      true only if the tool availability was changed

    • getTracer

      org.eclipse.osgi.service.debug.DebugTrace getTracer()
      Send messages to Eclipse tracer and MCP logger. Use EXTENSIONS_TRACE_OPTION as the option parameter
      Returns:
